disp-quote.p: “A few days ago, a health center was attacked by the angry community and two police officers were left with injuries due to throwing stones. There were gunshots and property damage.” (doctor, ID#16)

“The community is having a hard time digesting the high number of deaths at the ETC [EVD treatment centre]. The ETC is well guarded, so the community attacked the health post that transferred the patient to the ETC.” (doctor, ID#16)
